channel.title: I dont have a router.. does that mean i cant run my server?
channel.description: cause in Mod Taharoks ultimate server guide i have to get into my router for somethin and if i dont have one does that mean i cant run my server?

item.title: I dont have a router.. does that mean i cant run my server?
item.dc:creator: @XmoparscapeX XmoparscapeX
item.description:
@XmoparscapeX wrote:

you ned a router or it lagg or use hamachi its less lagg but not many people join

Read full topic
item.source: I dont have a router.. does that mean i cant run my server?

item.title: I dont have a router.. does that mean i cant run my server?
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

no you cant run one unless you get a router and if you do get one you need to port forward your router for your local ip to have the tcp port that the server source needs
Omg.. i'm runing a serv without a router and it works ... only without router it gives more lagg :)

Noober

Read full topic
